law.text: The indictment charging the commission of an offense under this chapter need not allege that a vote was taken or an election held in the territory where the offense is alleged to have been committed, but it may simply allege that the act charged was committed in dry or moist territory and was a violation of this chapter.
law.history: Amended 2013 Ky. Acts ch. 121, sec. 30, effective June 25, 2013. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 2554c-35.
